org.apache.jmeter.visualizers

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • org.apache.jmeter.visualizers.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.Scrollable, Clearable

    public class Graph
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements javax.swing.Scrollable, Clearable
    Implements a simple graph for displaying performance results.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
